has anyone been able to dive into the zksharding documentation from =nil? 

https://cms.nil.foundation/uploads/zk_Sharding_Manifesto_8286652990.pdf

going through the documentation and unfamiliar with what ideas are novel and which are being revisited from previous literature on sharding. curious if there are references anywhere that go through the history of the proposal here, its interesting but difficult to grok without a understanding of the prior art.

catching up on the sharding research compendium here https://notes.ethereum.org/@serenity/H1PGqDhpm?type=view

would appreciate pointers to what is promising and how to navigate the proposals here, particularly around cross-shard communication
